item.title: BL-90 East at US-14A
item.description: BL-90 East at US-14A. Turn right for US-14 East to Spearfish Canyon and Cheyenne Crossing. Continue ahead for BL-90 east for Deadwood. Deadwood is not directly assessable via BL-90 or I-90, but is the preferred route from Spearfish.

item.title: End US-14A At US-14 - Burgess Jct.
item.description: End US-14A at US-14 - Burgess Jct. Turn right for US-14 west to Shell and Greybull; turn left for US-14 east to Dayton and Sheridan. There is also a Bighorn Scenic Byway sign, of which either direction US-14 is part of.

item.title: US-310 West/WY-789 North at US-14A
item.description: US-310 West/WY-789 North at US-14A in Lovell. Turn right for US-14A East to Burgess Jct.; continue ahead for US-310/US-14A West/WY-789 North to Lovell and Powell.

item.title: US-310/WY-789 North Approaching US-14A
item.description: US-310/WY-789 North approaching US-14A in Lovell.

item.title: BL-90/SD-34/SD-79 in Sturgis
item.description: BL-90, SD-34, SD-79, To US-14A Shields
